title: Documention - Error in "Writing Web Applications" Codewalk
body:
by **shon.feder**: 
This issue was already raised here:
https://golang.org/issue/3733&;can=1&q=Writing%20Web%20Applications&colspec=ID%20Status%20Stars%20Priority%20Owner%20Reporter%20Summary

However, it persists though that ticket has been marked as 'fixed'.

- In the section "Handling Non-Existent Pages
(http://golang.org/doc/articles/wiki/#tmp_7), the second line of the example code for
viewHandler() reads `title, err := getTitle(w, r)`.  However, getTitle() isn't
introduced until the section on "validation", at which point the learner is
instructed to add it to viewHandler().

Hope this is helpful and not-pestering. Thanks very much for all of youall's help and
work on this project.  It's been great fun learning go.
